name: Arch Rivals (itch) (Amethyst Ram Studios)
description:
Fight your friends by shooting arrows at each other, but be careful because you'll need to pick your shots back up!

With head-to-head combat either play a quick game or play a tournament with up to 16 people!

Controls

Keyboard/Xbox controls

Move: A&D / Left Stick left&right

Jump: Space / A 

Shoot Left:  Left arrow / LT

Shoot Right: Right arrow / RT

Drop: S / Left Stick down

On hold

Development is currently on hold for this project with a potential return in the future to add polish where it's lacking. This could include more playable maps, customizable match settings, sound effects, music, and new sprites! There isn't a planned return at this time as development time is being focused on other projects.
